name: Transporter and Logistics Law
description: This law includes federal port protections and district extensions, transporters and bonuses, power plant construction payments, and repair

properties.Title: Federal Port Protections + Extensions
properties.UserDescription: \\Implementation Notes: Add Port expansion districts. Authorized builder is a stand-in for port authority.

properties.Title: Transporter Bonus Wage
properties.UserDescription:
\\Implementation Notes: Add the government store district + port expansion. Authorized builder is a stand-in for Federal Transporter.
This article gives Federal Transporters a bonus for transporting goods to governmental warehouses based on their overall currencies trades (any) for the last 24 hours.

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen currently being processed for the timer event.

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Title: Transporter Wage
properties.UserDescription:
\\Implementation Notes:  Authorized builder is stand-in for federal transporters.
This article gives Federal Transporters a wage based on the index wage. Transporters only earn their wage while active and online. Transporters are not eligible for a pension.

properties.Title: Federal Power Plant Mining Workers Pay
properties.UserDescription: This article authorizes payment for miners to excavate space underneath the Federal Power Plant district for the purposes of garbage storage.
